TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ChartGroup

summary.span: 代表图表中用同一格式绘制的一个或多个系列。

span.span: Represents one or more series plotted in a chart with the same format.

para.span: 一个图表包含一个或多个图表组，每个图表组包含一个或多个 对象，并且每个数据系列包含一个或多个 对象。

span.span: A chart contains one or more chart groups, each chart group contains one or more objects, and each series contains one or more objects.

para.span: 例如，单张图表可能既包含折线图图表组，其中包含所有用折线图格式，绘制的数据系列也条形图图表组，其中包含所有用条形图格式绘制的数据系列。

span.span: For example, a single chart might contain both a line chart group, containing all the series plotted with the line chart format, and a bar chart group, containing all the series plotted with the bar chart format.

para.span: ChartGroup对象是集合的一个成员 。

span.span: The ChartGroup object is a member of the collection.

para.span: 使用ChartGroups（ ）（其中 是图表组的索引号）返回单个ChartGroup对象。

span.span: Use ChartGroups(), where is the chart group index number, to return a single ChartGroup object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Application { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在不使用对象识别符的情况下使用时，此属性返回一个 代表 Microsoft Word 应用程序的对象。

span.span: When used without an object qualifier, this property returns an object that represents the Microsoft Word application.

summary.span: 如果与对象识别符一起使用，则此属性返回代表指定对象的创建者的 Application 对象（可以将此属性与 OLE 自动化对象一起使用以返回该对象的应用程序）。

span.span: When used with an object qualifier, this property returns an Application object that represents the creator of the specified object (you can use this property with an OLE Automation object to return the application of that object).
Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlAxisGroup AxisGroup { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlAxisGroup get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlAxisGroup value); };
member this.AxisGroup : Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XlAxisGroup with get, set

span.span: Returns the type of axis group.
Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int BubbleScale { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.BubbleScale : int with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置指定图表组中气泡的比例因子。

span.span: Returns or sets the scale factor for bubbles in the specified chart group.
Read/write.

para.span: 此属性可以设置为从0（零）到300的整数，对应于默认大小的百分比。

span.span: This property can be set to an integer from 0 (zero) to 300, corresponding to a percentage of the default size.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object CategoryCollection([in]object Index) runtime managed
Public Function CategoryCollection (Optional Index As Object) As Object

param.name: Index
param.span: 要返回的类别的可见类别集合中的索引号。

span.span: The index number in the visible category collection of the category to return.

summary.span: 返回图表组中的所有可见类别或指定的可见类别。

span.span: Returns all the visible categories in the chart group, or the specified visible category.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个32位整数，该整数表示在其中创建指定对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit Integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.
Read-only.

para.span: 如果对象是在 Microsoft Word 中创建的，则该 属性返回十六进制数字是4d535744，表示字符串 "MSWD"。

span.span: If the object was created in Microsoft Word, the property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD".

para.span: 此属性主要用于在 Macintosh 上，其中每个应用程序都有一个四字符创建者代码中使用。

span.span: This property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code.

para.span: 例如，Microsoft Word 提供了 MSWD 的创建者代码。

span.span: For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD.

para.span: 有关此属性的其他信息，请参阅语言参考 Microsoft Office Macintosh 版本所附带的帮助。

span.span: For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int DoughnutHoleSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.DoughnutHoleSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置圆环图图表组的内径大小。

span.span: Returns or sets the size of the hole in a doughnut chart group.

summary.span: 内径大小以图表大小的百分比表示，有效取值范围为 10% 到 90%。

span.span: The hole size is expressed as a percentage of the chart size, between 10 and 90 percent.
Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DownBars As DownBars

span.span: Returns the down bars on a line chart.
Applies only to line charts.
Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DropLines As DropLines

summary.span: 返回折线图或面积图上系列的垂直线。

span.span: Returns the drop lines for a series on a line chart or area chart.

summary.span: 仅适用于折线图或分区图。

span.span: Applies only to line charts or area charts.
Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int FirstSliceAngle { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.FirstSliceAngle : int with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置第一个饼图或圆环图切片的角度，以度为单位（从垂直方向起为顺时针）。

span.span: Returns or sets the angle of the first pie-chart or doughnut-chart slice, in degrees (clockwise from vertical).

summary.span: 只适用于饼图、三维饼图和圆环图。

span.span: Applies only to pie, 3-D pie, and doughnut charts.
Read/write.

para.span: 可以是 0 到 360 之间的值。

span.span: Can be a value from 0 through 360.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object FullCategoryCollection([in]object Index) runtime managed
Public Function FullCategoryCollection (Optional Index As Object) As Object

param.name: Index
param.span: 要返回的类别的完整类别集合中的索引号。

span.span: The index number in the full category collection of the category to return.

summary.span: 返回图表组中的所有类别，或指定的类别，无论是可见还是已筛选掉。

span.span: Returns all the categories in the chart group, or the specified category, whether visible or filtered out.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int GapWidth { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.GapWidth : int with get, set

summary.span: 对于条形图和柱形图：以条形或柱形宽度百分数的形式返回或设置条形簇或柱形簇之间的距离。

span.span: Bar and Column charts: Returns or sets the space between bar or column clusters, as a percentage of the bar or column width.

summary.span: 对于饼图中的扇形和饼图中的条形：返回或设置图表的第一节和第二节之间的间距。

span.span: Pie of Pie and Bar of Pie charts: Returns or sets the space between the primary and secondary sections of the chart.
Read/write.

para.span: 该属性的值必须介于 0 到 500 之间。

span.span: The value of this property must be between 0 and 500.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Has3DShading { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Has3DShading : bool with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置一个值，该值确定图表组是否具有三维阴影。

span.span: Returns or sets the value determining if a chart group has three-dimensional shading.
Read/write.

value.span: 一个Boolean 类型的值，如果图表组具有三维阴影，则设置为True ，否则为False。

span.span: A Boolean set to True if chart group has three-dimensional shading, otherwise False.

para.span: 注意：设置Has3DShading = False会影响将图表材料设置为 "平面" 或删除效果，而将 "Has3DShading" 设置为Has3DShading = True会将图表内容设置为默认值。

span.span: Note: Setting Has3DShading = False has the effect of setting the chart material to "Flat", or removing the effect, whereas setting the Has3DShading = True sets the chart content to the default.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HasDropLines { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.HasDropLines : bool with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置一个值，该值指示图表是否有垂直线。

span.span: Returns or sets the value stating if the chart has drop lines.

summary.span: 仅应用于折线图和面积图。

span.span: Applies only to line and area charts.
Read/write.

value.span: 一个Boolean 类型的值，如果折线图或面积图中有垂直线，则设置为True ;否则为 False

span.span: A Boolean set to True if the line chart or area chart has drop lines; otherwise False

member this.HasHiLoLines : bool with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置一个值，该值指示图表是否有高低点连线。

span.span: Returns or sets the value stating if the chart has high-low lines.
Applies only to line charts.
Read/write.

value.span: 一个布尔值，如果折线图有高低点连线，则设置为True ;否则为 False

span.span: A Boolean set to True if the line chart has high-low lines; otherwise False

member this.HasRadarAxisLabels : bool with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置一个值，该值指示雷达图是否有坐标轴标签。

span.span: Returns or sets the value stating if a radar chart has axis labels.
Applies only to radar charts.
Read/write.

value.span: 如果雷达图有坐标轴标签，则设置为True的Boolean 类型;否则为 False

span.span: A Boolean set to True if a radar chart has axis labels; otherwise False

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HasSeriesLines { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.HasSeriesLines : bool with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置一个值，该值指示堆积柱形图或条形图中是否有系列线，或者复合饼图或复合条饼图的复合条是否在两个部分之间有连接符线。

span.span: Returns or sets the value stating if a stacked column chart or bar chart has series lines or if a Pie of Pie chart or Bar of Pie chart has connector lines between the two sections.

summary.span: 仅适用于二维堆积柱形图、堆积条形图、复合饼图或复合条饼图。

span.span: Applies only to 2-D stacked bar, 2-D stacked column, pie of pie, or bar of pie charts.
Read/write.

value.span: 根据列出的条件，设置为下表中列出的值的布尔值。DescriptionReturn ValueA 饼图或复合条饼图中的两个部分之间有连接符线的复合图。True如果为 True，则具有系列线的堆积柱形图或条形图False

span.span: A Boolean set to the values listed in the table below according to the conditions listed.DescriptionReturn ValueA Pie of Pie chart or Bar of Pie chart that has connector lines between the two sections.TrueA stacked column chart or bar chart that has series linesTrueOtherwiseFalse

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HasUpDownBars { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.HasUpDownBars : bool with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置一个值，该值指示图表是否有涨和跌柱线。

span.span: Returns or sets the value stating if a chart has up and down bars.
Applies only to line charts.
Read/write.

value.span: 一个布尔值，如果折线图有涨跌柱线，则设置为True ;否则为 False。

span.span: A Boolean set to True if the line chart has up and down bars; otherwise False.

Applies only to line charts.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Index As Integer
public: property int Index { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回对象在其同类对象所组成的集合内的编号。

span.span: Returns the index number of the object within the collection of similar objects.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Overlap { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Overlap : int with get, set

summary.span: 指定放置条形和柱形的方式。

span.span: Specifies how bars and columns are positioned.

summary.span: 取值范围在 -100 到 100 之间。

span.span: Can be a value between – 100 and 100.

summary.span: 仅应用于二维条形图和二维柱形图。

span.span: Applies only to 2-D bar and 2-D column charts.
Read/write.

para.span: 如果将此属性设置为–100，则条形图之间有一个条形宽度的位置。

span.span: If this property is set to – 100, bars are positioned so that there's one bar width between them.

para.span: 如果重叠比例为 0（零），条形之间没有间距（一个条形紧挨着另一条形）。

span.span: If the overlap is 0 (zero), there's no space between bars (one bar starts immediately after the preceding bar).

para.span: 如果重叠比例为 100，所有条形将完全重叠。

span.span: If the overlap is 100, bars are positioned on top of each other.

span.span: Returns the parent of the specified object.
Read-only.

member this.SecondPlotSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置复合饼图或复合条饼图的辅助分区的大小，以占主饼图大小的百分比表示。

span.span: Returns or sets the size of the secondary section of either a pie of pie chart or a bar of pie chart, as a percentage of the size of the primary pie.
Read/write.

para.span: 可以是 5 到 200 之间的值。

span.span: Can be a value from 5 to 200.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object SeriesCollection([in]object Index) runtime managed
Public Function SeriesCollection (Optional Index As Object) As Object

param.name: Index
param.span: Optional对象您希望返回的系列的名称或编号。

span.span: Optional Object The name or number of the series that you wish to have returned.

param.span: 如果未使用 Index，则将返回图表组中的所有系列。

span.span: If Index is not used, all the series in the chart group will be returned.

summary.span: 从图表组中返回请求的系列。

span.span: Returns the requested series from within the chart group.

returns.span: 一种格式的对象 ，表示图表组中所有请求的系列

span.span: An Object in the format, that represents all the requested series from the chart group

Valid only for bubble charts.
Read/write.

Read/write.
